name: ファラオリバース
summary: An ancient evil has been set loose, and Jonathan cursed in the process. Jonathan must now collect seven holy grails from around all of Egypt to cleanse himself of the curse of Sehur the First. Be delighted by the quirky humor, charming characters, and the beautifully designed world, in Pharaoh Rebirth+!
info:
• 别名: Pharaoh ReBirth
  • 平台: PC
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 官方网站: http://nicoindie.degigames.com/pharaoh/
